meta_description: Davis Arts Center offers a diverse array of engaging classes to nurture creativity and artistic expression for students of all ages in Sacramento, California.
accessibility_text:
#  Accessibility Statement

The Davis Arts Center is committed to making our website and our programs accessible to everyone in our community. We believe that all people should be able to engage with the arts and access information on our site without barriers.

**Our Commitment**

We work to follow the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) to the best of our ability. These guidelines help ensure that our website is usable for visitors with a wide range of abilities and assistive technologies.

Our ongoing efforts include:

  * Designing content with accessibility in mind
  * Using clear headings, readable text, and consistent navigation
  * Adding alternative text to images whenever possible
  * Ensuring forms, buttons, and interactive elements are usable with a keyboard
  * Monitoring site performance and updating features to improve accessibility

**Ongoing Improvements**

Accessibility is an ongoing process. As our website grows and new features or pages are added, we continue to review and improve accessibility across the site. We welcome feedback that can help us enhance the experience for all visitors.

**If You Need Assistance**

If you have difficulty accessing any part of our website, or if you would like to request an accommodation, please contact us through our Contact page or through the contact information listed in the footer of our site. We will do our best to respond promptly and work with you to provide the information or support you need.

collections_text:
# Davis  Arts  Center

Create, learn, and connect through artâ€”right here in Davis.

[ Browse Classes ](/classes-camps/)

## About  Our Organization

We believe that all children in California should have access to an Arts education that develops essential life skills.

Through artistic practice at the Davis Arts Center, students will develop a strong work ethic and a respect for materials, process, and subject. Students will be part of a creative community that celebrates the power and reward of close examination of our world, a willingness to engage in self-discovery, flexibility in the face of challenges, and a sense of joy in achievement.

### Classes & Camps

Davis Arts Center offers a diverse array of engaging classes to nurture creativity and artistic expression in the community.

[ Start Creating ](/classes-camps/)

### News

Stay updated on the latest news and exciting events happening at Davis Arts Center, where creativity comes to life!

[ Stay Informed ](/news)
